segments.text: She has contributed to a new school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I know . She is a famous woman and a focus of the newspaper now because of this thing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hear the school is very modern . It has the best equipments .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Do you know its name .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She said she would name it after her father .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I think she wants to do this thing in memory of her father .
segments.speaker: S2
